markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=604) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 42, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 198 <sup>4.0</sup>, [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=98) (Level 4), [Shadowcaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=101) (Level 4), [Soul Warden](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=173) (Level 4)

</column>

---

You make a pact with a creature that serves you and assists your spellcasting. You gain a [familiar](/familiar-abilities).

<title level="2">Familiar leads to...</title>
[Elemental Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=2988)
name: Familiar

</traits>

<additional-info>

---

<summary>
An animal serves you and assists your spellcasting.
</summary>
summary: An animal serves you and assists your spellcasting.
